name: SMB Intelligence
desc: Data on businesses in and around Opportunity Zones, federal zones where funds can invest gains in small business and real estate to defer capital gains taxes.
full_sector_coverage: We are focused on the overall small business sector.
sectors: Construction, Healthcare, Real Estate, Restaurants & Food Delivery, Retail, Software (SaaS)
advantages: We are the only organization that currently identifies operating businesses that are likely to qualify for investment under the federal Opportunity Zones program.
